apiMessages.DATA_NOT_FOUND: Data not found for the specific record
apiMessages.ACTIVE_INACTIVE_NOT_FOUND: There is no record found for the operation(active/inactive)
apiMessages.BRANCH_NOT_FOUND: Branch for the Vendor is not found
apiMessages.USER_EMAIL_PHONE_ALREADY_EXIST: User with the same e-mail or phone already exists.
apiMessages.WE_ARE_NOT_OPERATIONAL_AT_THE_MOMENT: Sorry, We are not operational at the moment
apiMessages.SERVER_ERROR: Connection failed! Please check your internet
apiMessages.NO_MIN_VENDOR_WALLET_BALANCE: You dont have enough balance to place order.
apiMessages.ORDER_PAYMENT_IS_SETTLED: Order COD amount is settled. It cannot be updated further.
apiMessages.PAYMENT_UPDATION_IS_LOCKED: Payment cannot be updated at this time as it is locked by Finance manager. Please try again later
apiMessages.PAYMENT_LOCK_IS_DISABLED: Payment is unlock so you canot do the settlment
apiMessages.AMOUNT_MISSMACTH: Amount got changed. Please refresh and try again
apiMessages.INVALID_IMPROVMENT_TYPE: You have enterd some wrong data
apiMessages.ALREADY_RATED: You are already rated for the order
apiMessages.ZONE_BUSY_MODE_ACTIVATED: Sorry, Busy mode is activated in the selected pickup
apiMessages.ORDER_DELIVERED_OR_CANCELLED: Sorry, You cannot edit this order as this order is already closed.
apiMessages.BRANCH_NAME_ALREADY_EXIST: Branch name already exists. Please contact Mashkor support team
apiMessages.AREA_BASED_RESTRICTION_ACTIVATED: Order creation failed. Area restriction activated.
apiMessages.PHONE_ALREADY_USED: User with the same phone already exists.
apiMessages.EMAIL_ALREADY_USED: User with the same email already exists.

cod.heading: If you're a business and using FleetX Dashboard for your customer deliveries:
cod.rule1: Cash on Delivery orders less than 50 KD will be paid by FleetX driver to you when picking up the order.
cod.rule2: Cash on Delivery orders more than 50 KD will be paid by FleetX drivers within 24 hours after delivering the order.

waitTime.rule1: FleetX driver can only wait up to¬†15 mins¬†at the pickup location.
waitTime.rule2: If the driver waits for more than 15 mins, he/she will be released and the¬†order will be cancelled.
